page.title: 02FASHION IN 1985
page.content: {MAKE UP} Eyeshadow for 1985 is two toned and bright coloured, usually purples and pinks. Lipstick is usually crystallised. {CLOTHES Girls' skirts are worn just below the knee, often with flowered blouses. Pastel coloured skirts and tops are also in fashion. Boys' trousers can be skin tight or gathered at the bottom with zips. {JEWELLERY} The jewellery for 1985 is diamond earings, necklaces, bracelets and brooches. Gold bangles are also in fashion, thick or thin. {SHOES Dolly shoes, pastel shoes and Roman style sandals are the fashionable footwear in 1985.
